cause.description:
Global warming, spontaneous tornadoes, and bllizzards... Ever wonder what contributes to them? It's the neglect of homo-sapiens when concerning the enviroment. Since primitive man, we were entitled to taking care of the enviroment. Today, there are easy and small tasks such as recycling, cutting the plastic rings that we get on soda can lids, and washing our cars on the lawn instead of the driveway, can help save our enviroment. It is at stake and we need your help to reclaim it. Help fight the cause by joining the group today!
1. Our enviroment should not ne overlooked.
2. Help fight the cause today
3. Its your health, your house, and your enviroment that's at stake!
cause.mission: Help Save and restore the enviroment
cause.name: TheEnvironment@stake.aswespeak
